title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. K, pt. 471 - Minimum Standards For Gun Locking Devices
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. K, pt. 471 - Minimum Standards For Gun Locking Devices

State Regulations
§ 471.1 - Definitions
§ 471.2 - Standards pertaining to the characteristics, design, operation and construction of gun locking devices
§ 471.3 - Standards pertaining to the performance of gun locking devices
§ 471.4 - Standards pertaining to the instructions for use of gun locking devices

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. K, pt. 471

Statutory authority: General Business Law, §
396-e
e[1]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
